TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CLActivityType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration whose values specify different types of activity.

remarks.para: By assigning , the system can make intelligent choices regarding location update frequency vs. power consumption.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLActivityType AutomotiveNavigation = int64(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the app is engaged in navigating an automobile. (Use for other vehicle types.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLActivityType Fitness = int64(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates fitness and all walking activities.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLActivityType Other = int64(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the activity type is unknown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype CoreLocation.CLActivityType OtherNavigation = int64(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the app is involved in navigation, but not in a car.

remarks.para: This value should be used for tracking motion in, e.g., trains, planes, and boats.
